objects.text:
• Sleek white minimalist design
• Ultra-thin profile for comfort
• Full-size layout with numpad
• Plug-and-play setup

product_details.name: Ultra-Slim Wireless Keyboard - Modern Minimalist Design with Full Functionality
product_details.description:
• Sleek white minimalist design perfect for modern workspaces
• Ultra-thin profile for enhanced comfort and ergonomics
• Full-size QWERTY layout with numeric keypad
• Quiet, low-profile keys for smooth typing experience
• Windows compatible with dedicated Windows key
• Compact form factor saves valuable desk space
• Wired USB connection for reliable, lag-free performance
• Durable construction with high-quality ABS plastic
• Plug-and-play setup - no drivers needed
• Perfect for office, home, or professional use
• Anti-slip feet for stable typing experience
• Professional white color scheme matches any desk setup

banner_details:
The banner features a clean and modern product advertisement layout split into four soft-toned quadrants with varying shades of blue. The central focus is a white ultra-slim keyboard image placed diagonally on the right side, visually emphasizing the product's minimalistic nature.

The promotional message is communicated through a bold headline (id: heading_1 and heading_2) in deep blue, followed by a tagline (id: tagline) in a sleek, light-blue modern font style. A red-colored promotional text (id: discount_text) adds urgency and contrast to the layout. A concise feature list (id: description) explains product highlights in bullet-format.

The pricing (id: price) uses large, bold blue typography, and a dark blue call-to-action button (id: cta_button) with contrasting white text (id: cta) drives instant attention.

Color Palette:
- Background Off-White: #F5F5F5
- Light Blue: #E8F4FA
- Medium Blue: #D6EBF5
- Sky Blue: #C2E0F0
- Deep Blue: #2D6B97
- Accent Blue: #4B9FD8
- Alert Red: #FF3A31
- Text Dark Gray: #333333
- Button Blue: #2D6B97
- Button Text White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a minimalist, modern white keyboard with a clean, sleek aesthetic. The dominant color is a soft, matte white (#F4F4F4), which provides a crisp, sophisticated backdrop. Light gray (#D1D1D1) is used for the outlines and shadowing around keys to offer subtle depth and definition. The key labels are primarily dark gray (#3A3A3A) for visibility, with select function keys and symbols in a muted red (#C14429), adding accent and visual interest. These colors blend harmoniously, creating contrast without clashing. Ideal advertising banners would use a clean palette of white, light gray, dark gray, and a hint of red to reflect elegance and clarity.
